title: Respond to Proposed Trust Fund Recovery Penalty
description: A business owner is being held personally liable for unpaid payroll taxes (Trust Fund Recovery Penalty). They need to respond.

tasks.description: Review the case to determine if the owner was a 'responsible person' and if the failure to pay was 'willful'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent analyzes the facts against the legal standards for the penalty.

tasks.description: Gather evidence to support the owner's defense (e.g., they had no control over finances).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles relevant documents and testimony.

tasks.description: Prepare a formal protest to appeal the proposed penalty.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts and files an appeal to dispute the penalty assessment.
